description: Sensitivity experiment with CO2 concentration fixed at 2005 levels at 378.81ppm.

Sensitivity experiment: only applies to models that take CO2 into account. CO2 concentration fixed at present-day value, i.e. run with transient historical CO2 up to the year 2000 and keep CO2 fixed at 369ppm thereafter.
Keep CO2 concentration constant at 1971 level. For spin-up, use time-varying, historical CO2 concentration until 1970.
